queries.title: StaffingTemplateSelect_Query
queries.description: Fetches staffing templates with filtering options. Limited to first 20 results. Uses StaffingTemplateSelect_StaffingTemplateFragment.

queries.title: StaffingTemplatesTable_Query
queries.description: Retrieves staffing templates for table display with pagination and filtering support. Uses StaffingTemplatesTable_StaffingTemplateListFragment.

mutations.title: DeleteStaffingTemplatesButton_DeleteMutation
mutations.description: Deletes a staffing template and updates connection edges.

mutations.title: EditStaffingTemplateModal_CreateMutation
mutations.description: Creates a new staffing template. Uses EditStaffingTemplateButton_StaffingTemplateFragment.

mutations.title: EditStaffingTemplateModal_EditMutation
mutations.description: Updates an existing staffing template. Uses EditStaffingTemplateButton_StaffingTemplateFragment.

mutations.title: ImportStaffingTemplatesButton_ImportMutation

fragments.title: EditStaffingTemplateModal_StaffingTemplateFragment
